sentence.value: Umberto Guidoni (born in Rome 18 August 1954) is an Italian astrophysicist, science writer and a former ESA astronaut.

sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Umberto Guidoni|Umberto_Guidoni]] (born in [[Rome|Rome]] 18 August 1954) is an [[Italian|Italy]] [[astrophysicist|Astrophysics]], science writer and a former ESA [[astronaut|Astronaut]].
